steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.md" page that contains "{{ site.title }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text| File.write(file, <<~DATA) --- #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"} --- #{text} DATA end ', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "title" set to "Hello World"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value| config = \ if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist? " in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file| step %(the "#{file}" file should exist) regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE) if negative.nil? || negative.empty? expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp else expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp end end ', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

test_case: Unrendered collection
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "Collections: {{ site.methods }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have fixture collections', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have fixture collections(?: in "(.*)" directory)?$!) do |directory|
  collections_dir = File.join(source_dir, directory.to_s)
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_methods"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_thanksgiving"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_tutorials"), collections_dir
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_methods/static-file.txt" file that contains "Static Content {{ site.title }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "collections" set to "['methods']"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'the _site/methods directory should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 9, 'step_name': 'the "_site/methods/configuration.html" file should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 10, 'step_name': 'the "_site/methods/static-file.txt" file should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have fixture collections', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have fixture collections(?: in "(.*)" directory)?$!) do |directory|

  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_methods"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_thanksgiving"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_tutorials"), collections_dir
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_config.yml" file with content', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file with content:$!) do |file, text|

end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I should see "Collections: _methods/3940394-21-9393050-fifif1323-test.md _methods/collection/entries _methods/configuration.md _methods/escape-\+ #%20\[\].md _methods/sanitized_path.md _methods/site/generate.md _methods/site/initialize.md _methods/trailing-dots...md _methods/um_hi.md" in "_site/index.html" unless Windows', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)" unless Windows$!) do |negative, text, file|

    else
      expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
    end
  end
end

test_case: Unrendered collection with future dated document
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _puppies directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following documents under the puppies collection', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following documents? under the (.*) collection:$!) do |folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    filename = "#{title}.md"
    dest_folder = "_#{folder}"

    path = File.join(dest_folder, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_config.yml" file with content', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file with content:$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a "foo.txt" file that contains "random static file"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'the "_site/puppies/rover.html" file should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 9, 'step_name': 'the "_site/puppies/fido.html" file should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(file)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 10, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build --future', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 11, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)

test_case: All the documents
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "All documents: {% for doc in site.documents %}{{ doc.relative_path }} {% endfor %}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have fixture collections', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have fixture collections(?: in "(.*)" directory)?$!) do |directory|
  collections_dir = File.join(source_dir, directory.to_s)
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_methods"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_thanksgiving"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_tutorials"), collections_dir
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_config.yml" file with content', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file with content:$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I should see "All documents: _methods/3940394-21-9393050-fifif1323-test.md _methods/collection/entries _methods/configuration.md _methods/escape-\+ #%20\[\].md _methods/sanitized_path.md _methods/site/generate.md _methods/site/initialize.md _methods/trailing-dots...md _methods/um_hi.md" in "_site/index.html" unless Windows', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)" unless Windows$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    if Jekyll::Utils::Platforms.really_windows?
      expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
    else
      expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
    end
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'I should see "All documents: _methods/3940394-21-9393050-fifif1323-test.md _methods/collection/entries _methods/configuration.md _methods/escape-\+ #%20\[\].md _methods/sanitized_path.md _methods/site/generate.md _methods/site/initialize.md _methods/trailing-dots...md _methods/yaml_with_dots.md" in "_site/index.html" if on Windows', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)" if on Windows$!) do |negative, text, file|

  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    if Jekyll::Utils::Platforms.really_windows?
      expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
    else
      expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
    end
  end
end

test_case: Custom collections_dir containing only posts
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a collections/_posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post within the "collections" directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|post)s? within the "(.*)" directory:$!) do |type, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])

    filename = type == "draft" ? "#{title}.markdown" : "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.markdown"

    path = File.join(folder, "_#{type}s", filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))

      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

test_case: Sort all entries by a Front Matter key defined in all entries
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "Collections: {{ site.tutorials | map: 'title' | join: ', ' }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have fixture collections in "gathering" directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have fixture collections(?: in "(.*)" directory)?$!) do |directory|
  collections_dir = File.join(source_dir, directory.to_s)
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_methods"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_thanksgiving"), collections_dir
  FileUtils.cp_r Paths.source_dir.join("test", "source", "_tutorials"), collections_dir
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|

    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a "_layouts/tutorial.html" file with content', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file with content:$!) do |file, text|

end

test_case: Basic site with a post
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _includes directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "Basic Site with include tag: {% include about.textile %}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have an "_includes/about.textile" file that contains "Generated by Jekyll"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, text|

end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|

  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I should see "Basic Site with include tag: Generated by Jekyll" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)

  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "URL: {% post_url 2008-01-01-entry2 %}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "permalink" set to "pretty"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "permalink" set to "none"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _drafts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|

    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following draft', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])

    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a default layout that contains "{{ site.time | date_to_xmlschema }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) (layout|theme) that contains "(.*)"$!) do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?

  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

test_case: Sort pages by the title ordering pages without title last
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following pages', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following page', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|

    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)

      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date

end

test_case: Override frontmatter defaults by type
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "interesting stuff"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "defaults" set to "[{scope: {path: "", type: "post"}, values: {permalink: "/post.html"}}, {scope: {path: "", type: "page"}, values: {permalink: "/page.html"}}, {scope: {path: ""}, values: {permalink: "/perma.html"}}]"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should see "blabla" in "_site/post.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)

  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

test_case: Include a file relative to a post
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts/snippets directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have an "_posts/snippets/welcome_para.md" file that contains "Welcome back Dear Reader!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, text|

end

end

steps:

  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "collections_dir" set to "collections"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a collections/_posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|

    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have the following post within the "collections" directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|post)s? within the "(.*)" directory:$!) do |type, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])

    filename = type == "draft" ? "#{title}.markdown" : "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.markdown"

    path = File.join(folder, "_#{type}s", filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

test_case: A themed-site and incremental regeneration
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "theme" set to "test-theme"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

end

test_case: Linking to a ghost file
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.md" page that contains "[About my projects]({% link about.md %})"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have an "about.md" page that contains "[Contact]({% link contact.md %})"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I should get a non-zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a non-zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should not see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end
', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should not exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should see "Could not find document 'contact.md' in tag 'link'" in the build output', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in the build output$!) do |negative, text|
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(jekyll_run_output).to match Regexp.new(text)
  else
    expect(jekyll_run_output).not_to match Regexp.new(text)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

test_case: Markdown in list on index
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "paginate" set to "5"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value| config = \ if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist? SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml")) else {} end config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value) Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone" File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config)) end ', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "Index - {% for post in site.posts %} {{ post.content }} {% endfor %}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text| File.write(file, <<~DATA) --- #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"} --- #{text} DATA end ', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? test_case: Paginate with N posts per page
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with:$!) do |table|
  table.hashes.each do |row|
    step %(I have a configuration file with "#{row["key"]}" set to "#{row["value"]}")
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "{{ paginator.posts.size }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

test_case: Use custom permalink schema with prefix
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a simple layout that contains "Post title: {{ page.title }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) (layout|theme) that contains "(.*)"$!) do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have the following post in "movies"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _layouts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a simple layout that contains "Post author: {{ page.author }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) (layout|theme) that contains "(.*)"$!) do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a "index.md" page with layout "none" that contains "Hi there, {{ site.author }}!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _trials directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_trials/no-layout.md" page with layout "none" that contains "Hi there, {{ site.author }}!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have a "_trials/test.md" page with layout "null" that contains "Hi there, {{ site.author }}!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I have a none layout that contains "{{ content }}Welcome!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) (layout|theme) that contains "(.*)"$!) do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I have a page layout that contains "{{ content }}Check this out!"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) (layout|theme) that contains "(.*)"$!) do |name, type, text|
  folder = type == "layout" ? "_layouts" : "_theme"

  destination_file = Pathname.new(File.join(folder, "#{name}.html"))
  FileUtils.mkdir_p(destination_file.parent) unless destination_file.parent.directory?
  File.write(destination_file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with:$!) do |table|
  table.hashes.each do |row|
    step %(I have a configuration file with "#{row["key"]}" set to "#{row["value"]}")
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 9, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 10, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 11, 'step_name': 'I should not see "Welcome!" in "_site/trials/no-layout.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 12, 'step_name': 'I should not see "Check this out!" in "_site/trials/no-layout.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 13, 'step_name': 'I should see "Check this out!" in "_site/trials/test.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 14, 'step_name': 'I should see "Hi there, John Doe!" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 15, 'step_name': 'I should not see "Welcome!" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 16, 'step_name': 'I should not see "Build Warning:" in the build output', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in the build output$!) do |negative, text|
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(jekyll_run_output).to match Regexp.new(text)
  else
    expect(jekyll_run_output).not_to match Regexp.new(text)
  end
end

test_case: Render liquid in Sass
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.scss" page that contains ".foo-bar { color:{{site.color}}; }"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "color" set to "red"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should see ".foo-bar {\n  color: red;\n}\n\n\/\*# sourceMappingURL=index.css.map \*\/" in "_site/index.css"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "highlighter" set to "rouge"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following post', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

test_case: Limit the number of posts generated by most recent date
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with:$!) do |table|
  table.hashes.each do |row|
    step %(I have a configuration file with "#{row["key"]}" set to "#{row["value"]}")
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'the "_site/2009/04/05/bananas.html" file should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|

  end
end

test_case: arbitrary file reads via layouts
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page with layout "page" that contains "FOO"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a "_config.yml" file that contains "layouts: '../../../../../../../../../../../../../../usr/include'"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should see "FOO" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I should not see " " in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

test_case: Use site.posts variable for latest post
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a _posts directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "{{ site.posts.first.title }}: {{ site.posts.first.url }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

end

  if negative.nil?

  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I should see "Third Post: /2009/03/27/third-post.html" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "{% for post in site.categories.code %} {{ post.title }} {% endfor %}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have the following posts', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have the following (draft|page|post)s?(?: (in|under) "([^"]+)")?:$!) do |status, direction, folder, table|
  table.hashes.each do |input_hash|
    title = slug(input_hash["title"])
    ext = input_hash["type"] || "markdown"
    filename = "#{title}.#{ext}" if %w(draft page).include?(status)
    before, after = location(folder, direction)
    dest_folder = "_drafts" if status == "draft"
    dest_folder = "_posts"  if status == "post"
    dest_folder = "" if status == "page"

    if status == "post"
      parsed_date = Time.xmlschema(input_hash["date"]) rescue Time.parse(input_hash["date"])
      input_hash["date"] = parsed_date
      filename = "#{parsed_date.strftime("%Y-%m-%d")}-#{title}.#{ext}"
    end

    path = File.join(before, dest_folder, after, filename)
    File.write(path, file_content_from_hash(input_hash))
  end
end

test_case: A theme without data
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I have a configuration file with "theme" set to "test-theme-skinny"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have a configuration file with "(.*)" set to "(.*)"$!) do |key, value|
  config = \
    if source_dir.join("_config.yml").exist?
      SafeYAML.load_file(source_dir.join("_config.yml"))
    else
      {}
    end
  config[key] = SafeYAML.load(value)
  Jekyll.set_timezone(value) if key == "timezone"
  File.write("_config.yml", YAML.dump(config))
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I have a _data directory', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? (.*) directory$!) do |dir|
  unless File.directory?(dir)
    then FileUtils.mkdir_p(dir)
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I have a "_data/greetings.yml" file with content', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" file with content:$!) do |file, text|
  File.write(file, text)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'I have an "index.html" page that contains "{{ site.data.greetings.foo }}"', 'glue_code': 'Given(%r!^I have an? "(.*)" page(?: with (.*) "(.*)")? that contains "(.*)"$!) do |file, key, value, text|
  File.write(file, <<~DATA)
    ---
    #{key || "layout"}: #{value || "none"}
    ---

    #{text}
  DATA
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll build', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do
  step %(I should see "EXIT STATUS: 0" in the build output)
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'the _site directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'I should see "Hello! Im foo. And who are you?" in "_site/index.html"', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should (not )?see "(.*)" in "(.*)"$!) do |negative, text, file|
  step %(the "#{file}" file should exist)
  regexp = Regexp.new(text, Regexp::MULTILINE)
  if negative.nil? || negative.empty?
    expect(file_contents(file)).to match regexp
  else
    expect(file_contents(file)).not_to match regexp
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}]

[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll new-theme my-cool-theme', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'I should get a zero exit status', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get a zero exit(?:-| )status$!) do

end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'the my-cool-theme directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|

test_case: Checking if a bonafide Theme gem will be built from generated scaffolding
steps:
[{'step_num': 1, 'step_name': 'I run jekyll new-theme my-cool-theme', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run jekyll(.*)$!) do |args|
  run_jekyll(args)
  if args.include?("--verbose") || ENV["DEBUG"]
    warn "\n#{jekyll_run_output}\n"
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 2, 'step_name': 'the my-cool-theme directory should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the (.*) directory should +(not )?exist$!) do |dir, negative|
  if negative.nil?
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to exist
  else
    expect(Pathname.new(dir)).to_not exist
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 3, 'step_name': 'I decide to build the theme gem', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I decide to build the theme gem$!) do
  Dir.chdir(Paths.theme_gem_dir)
  [
    "_includes/blank.html",
    "_sass/blank.scss",
    "assets/blank.scss",
    "_config.yml"
  ].each do |filename|
    File.new(filename, "w")
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 4, 'step_name': 'the "_includes/blank.html" file should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|

end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 5, 'step_name': 'the "_sass/blank.scss" file should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 6, 'step_name': 'the "assets/blank.scss" file should exist', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^the "(.*)" file should +(not )?exist$!) do |file, negative|

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 7, 'step_name': 'I run git add .', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run git add .$!) do
  run_in_shell("git", "add", ".", "--verbose")
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 8, 'step_name': 'I should get an updated git index', 'glue_code': 'Then(%r!^I should get an updated git index$!) do
  index = %w(
    .gitignore
    Gemfile
    LICENSE.txt
    README.md
    _config.yml
    _includes/blank.html
    _layouts/default.html
    _layouts/page.html
    _layouts/post.html
    _sass/blank.scss
    assets/blank.scss
    my-cool-theme.gemspec
  )
  index.each do |file|
    expect(jekyll_run_output).to match file
  end
end

', 'glue_code_file': 'step_definitions.rb', 'language': 'ruby'}, {'step_num': 9, 'step_name': 'I run gem build --force my-cool-theme.gemspec', 'glue_code': 'When(%r!^I run gem(.*)$!) do |args|

end
